title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Transform your home into a winter wonderland with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set! This set includes a 23.6-inch wreath and an 8.8-foot garland, both adorned with snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches. The 100 warm LED lights add a cozy glow, and with the 6-hour on, 18-hour off timer function, you can enjoy hassle-free illumination. 

Crafted from sturdy, high-quality materials, this set is hypoallergenic and fireproof for your peace of mind. Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, you can hang it on your wall, door, fireplace, or anywhere else you desire. Plus, with a 365-day warranty and 24-hour customer service, you can rest assured that your holiday decor will be top-notch. Don't miss out on this maintenance-free, long-lasting set that will never fade. Purchase yours today and make this holiday season one to remember!

The 100 warm LED lights add a cozy glow to your indoor or outdoor Christmas decorations. No need to worry about assembly as it comes fully assembled and ready to hang. Made of high-quality, hypoallergenic, and fireproof materials, this set is durable and maintenance-free, never fading or needing water.
